name: Machine Girl
description:
'''Machine Girl''' (sometimes stylized as '''machin3gir1''') is an American [[electronic music]] project created in 2012 by Matt Stephenson (also known as ''DJ Chaotic Ugly'') in [[Long Island]], [[New York (state)|New York]]. In 2015, the project became a duo, with Stephenson recruiting percussionist Sean Kelly to play live drums. Touring member Lucy Caputi joined in 2024 as a live guitarist. 

In 2022, Machine Girl composed the original soundtrack for the video game ''[[Neon White]]'', coming in two parts—"The Wicked Heart" and "The Burn That Cures"—in link with the scenario of the game. It was well received.
